US.textOverview: Travel is restricted to east coast due to severe weather.

BJ.textOverview: Travel restricted due to elections from March 2-7

BF.textOverview:
Limited travel to Ouagadougou for Burkina Faso PCVs due to ongoing security concerns in the area. Visiting
Volunteers will only be allowed to transit through Ouagadougou
Travel Plan required for this country
